name: Zucchini Tomato Thyme Skillet
description: The Zucchini Tomato Thyme Skillet is a vibrant, low-carb and low-sugar dish perfect for those looking to enjoy healthy yet flavorful options. With the freshness of thyme and the tanginess of tomatoes, it's a healthified recipe that doesn't compromise on taste.
recipeIngredient: 1  tsp ground (2.3 g), Black Pepper - Ground

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare your vegetables by slicing the zucchini into thin rounds and chopping the tomatoes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Season the sliced zucchini with salt, ground black pepper, and fresh thyme.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a skillet over medium heat and add a dash of coconut aminos to prevent sticking.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Arrange the seasoned zucchini slices in the skillet and let them cook for about 5 minutes until they are slightly tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chopped tomatoes to the skillet and cook for an additional 5 minutes until the tomatoes are just softened and the zucchini is fully cooked.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle the dish with additional thyme before serving warm.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
